targets.query:
from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Load.power/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Total.active.power/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Feeder.power/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Daily.power/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Total.power.yield/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Total.running.time/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Internal.temperature/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Load.power/)
  |> integral(unit: 3600s)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Total.active.power/)
  |> integral(unit: 3600s)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Feeder.power/)
  |> integral(unit: 3600s)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Work.state/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Work.state.2/)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Load.power|Feeder.power/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Phase.A/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Total.DC.power|Total.active.power/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /DC.current.of.MPPT/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /DC.voltage.of.MPPT/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /DC.voltage.of.MPPT/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /DC.current.of.MPPT/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Impedance.to.ground/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Nominal.reactive.output.power/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Grid.frequency/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "Sungrow")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /Power.factor/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_measurement"])
